Talks

Refereed conference talks

  • About the Polish translation of Jaśkowski’s paper entitled “On tautologies in which no variable occurs more than twice”, September 26, 2018, 9th Non-Classical Logic. Theory and Applications, Department of Logic at Nicolaus Copernicus University in Toruń

  • Formal learning theory and rationality in learning the natural language, September 21, 2018, 6th Young Researchers Days in Logic, Philosophy and History of Science by The Belgian Society for Logic and Philosophy of Science (BSLPS), Brussels, Belgium

  • What Poincare’s conventional geometry means for anti-exceptionalism of logical calculi, September 15, 2018, Colloquium Logicum 2018, Deutsche Vereinigung für Mathematische Logik und für Grundlagenforschung in den exakten Wissenschaften (DVMLG), University of Bayreuth, Germany

  • On what anti-exceptionalism can do for the logic of conditionals, 3 July, 2018, Congrès de la Société de philosophie analytique (SoPhA), Université catholique de Louvain
